Name: Coffee Company
Review Text: Great coffee house (the not weed kind) with local roasts and excellent espresso drinks and a healthy supplement of finger foods to keep you going. The shop has a good selection of magazines and stable wifi of you need to burn some time. Has restroom and takes card.

Name: Coffee Company
Review Text: We just walked in along our wanderings and found a pleasant relaxed cafe with free WiFi and clean toilets. Lovely homemade lemonade. Great coffee. Unfortunately no food, only cakes. We were lucky to enjoy an art exhibition in the cafe as well.

Name: Coffee Company
Review Text: Nice atmosphere and great coffee. Perfect place to work or study or just chill away from the madness of the streets.

Name: Coffee Company
Review Text: You gotta be lucky to find a place, where you can sit. Otherwise, ok

Name: Coffee Company
Review Text: Vegan Dhal Toastie doesn't look like much, bit it sure hits the spot and is at a good price. Coffee is eh (kinda weak, drip coffee) but I don't hold it against them. Cute place to either check emails or plan your day, lots of local youngsters studying / working or hanging out here.

Name: Coffee Company
Review Text: Very nice coffee shop! Really good coffee and great sandwiches. Also the staff was always very friendly. The location is quite hip and very clean. There are also some seats outside in front of the shop.

Name: Coffee Company
Review Text: In amsterdam, many Cafe and shops don't open early in the morning(even around 10).  But I went here because the place I wanted to go did not open until 12. So I went here instead but I was very satisfied with coffee and carrot pound cake.

Name: Coffee Company
Review Text: Not sure about the coffee quality (I'm not a coffee expert). But the coffee drinks are pretty good👌🏻

Name: Coffee Company
Review Text: Coffee was good, for the desserts it’s limited options

Name: Coffee Company
Review Text: Fastest Wi-Fi in ninestreets/Jordan (I've worked most of them), narrow space but always a spare chair. Then the usual magazine selection and moderate design that makes Coffee Company the safest bet wherever you are in Amsterdam.

Name: Coffee Company
Review Text: Good spot for a quick coffee on the go. Tried to get food but they had run out already.

Name: Coffee Company
Review Text: Small place to enjoy a good coffee while people watching on the busy little street

Name: Coffee Company
Review Text: Nice 👍🏻

Name: Coffee Company
Review Text:
I’m giving them a one star for service.

I understand it’s covid times but being friendly should be a given especially if …

Name: Coffee Company
Review Text: Welcoming staff, good coffee, central location.

Name: Coffee Company
Review Text: Nice place and helpful waiters. They have a variety of coffee products that you'd also expect in typical American coffee places, such as Starbucks. They have a back area where you can consume your beverage and in warmer weather there is room outside for a few tables and seats. The place has a clean yet somewhat cozy feel to it.

Name: Coffee Company
Review Text: I used to visit this coffee ,but the girl that work there she treat her customer bad !!

Name: Coffee Company
Review Text: Awfully bad. Long waiting time although we were the only customers. Prepared the coffee for drinking in even when we ordered to go and than only poured the coffee into the to go cup. Almond milk cappuccino did not taste at all like decomposed

Name: Coffee Company
Review Text: Good coffee with relatively friendly staff. The only problem I have with this location is cleanliness. The large table has big gaps in between the boards that are full of crumbs and garbage. Not a pleasant drinking experience. Would come here again for a coffee to go, but not to sit down.

Name: Coffee Company
Review Text: Lovely spot for a cup of coffee. Very clean, open, fresh interior. Great service and good pastries. They even had a couple vegan pastry options. Visited a couple times during our stay in Amsterdam

Name: Coffee Company
Review Text:
Everywhere you go in Amsterdam, you're going to find great coffee, but on my week long trip, I can say that the best espresso drinks were here at coffee company. The decor is nice, they have a few power outlets for laptops.
If you haven't had one before, try a Cortado.

Name: Coffee Company
Review Text: My favourite place to go for a coffee. They have various milk options (I always have oat) and the staff are always friendly. They generally have a super chill vibe too. (The one in the Nine Streets does take card payment by the way)

Name: Coffee Company
Review Text: Nice cafe but Chai latte was WAY sweet, and only after I ordered it and tried t did they tell me there’s extra sugar in the mix. Also the lemon poppyseed cake was very stale, probably from the day before. Not worth it.

Name: Coffee Company
Review Text: Way better than any American chain cafe. Good nondairy milk options and a vegan pastry on the menu. Laptop-friendly and quiet enough for a Skype call. Be advised, the wifi password changes daily.

Name: Coffee Company
Review Text: Amsterdam’s version of Starbucks.  Always a reliable cup of coffee.  Drinks are ‘crafted’ to order so if there’s more then 3 people in line in front of you, expect to wait 10 minutes for a drink.

Name: Coffee Company
Review Text: Great atmosphere for coffee. Good wifi connection. Chilling place for tourist for a rest. Friendly staff. The only thing I would comment is the coffee has been overpriced. Otherwise everything is perfect.

Name: Coffee Company
Review Text: Very cozy atmosphere and great coffee! The service was great and you can definitely capture some Instagram worthy shots here :> i definitely suggest this place if you're looking to have a nice cup of coffee.

Name: Coffee Company
Review Text: Really tasty coffee and lots of different beverages like teas. Staff is superfriendly and the music taste that they have is simply the best. Thank you guys!

Name: Coffee Company
Review Text: They have specialty coffee with different flavors the barista did a great job of making my coffee I enjoyed drinking it in the cold weather.

Name: Coffee Company
Review Text: Good place for a casual coffee. Specially remarkable are the iced coffees. Consider buying the coupons they sell to save money, if you go often.

Name: Coffee Company
Review Text: Friendly staff and great choice of coffees, teas and nice juices. The chai with almond milk was lovely. I like the big wooden communal table.

Name: Coffee Company
Review Text: Seek them out for a good, decent coffee with all the regular pastries.

Name: Coffee Company
Review Text: Crowded, noisy, cramped space, average coffee at above average prices. Sadly there are little other options in Amsterdam city center.

Name: Coffee Company
Review Text: The coffee is nice, and they're quick to make it, so it perfect for when you're in a hurry and want a take away drink. I wish they had more snacks or sandwiches.

Name: Coffee Company
Review Text: Decent place for coffee in the center of Amsterdam. Free wifi. But pastries, baked goods, sandwiches are of average quality.

Name: Coffee Company
Review Text: Good coffee and a nice place to work with your laptop or read a book. The staff is friendly and the cafe is in a very nice neighbourhood. The coffee is a bit overpriced.

Name: Coffee Company
Review Text: we had nice fresh juices break there from touring Amsterdam by foot, didn't try food but the barista was nice and the toilet was clean.

Name: Coffee Company
Review Text: Nice, quiet cafe with good quality coffee. Interesting and unique art. The staff is friendly and helpful.

Name: Coffee Company
Review Text: Favorite coffee spot in my Amsterdam neighborhood

Name: Coffee Company
Review Text: Great service,  nice place and good drinks!

Name: Coffee Company
Review Text: Great coffee, yummy toasty and nice vibe. Good place to go and do some work/read.

Name: Coffee Company
Review Text: Even though coffe company is a chain they make some really good coffe. It is also a nice and relaxing place to work.

Name: Coffee Company
Review Text: Friendly service, excellent coffee

Name: Coffee Company
Review Text: Nice quieter café to the West of Centraal. Wacky art and good quality coffee. One of the nicer branches of this chain.

Name: Coffee Company
Review Text: Expensive and mediocre coffee. Seems more like a place for people who need Wi-Fi rather than people who enjoy coffee.

Name: Coffee Company
Review Text: The coffee isn’t good at all. and there is too many people ( very busy area)

Name: Coffee Company
Review Text: Toooo noisy + very closed place + expensive. The internet quality was good and the staffs were friendly. Located little far from CS.

Name: Coffee Company
Review Text: great tasting coffee. strong coffee! almond and oat milk options for vegans, woohoo!

Name: Coffee Company
Review Text: Was staying in the area and had some difficulty finding a coffee shop that was open early. Coffee for the bill nicely.

Name: Coffee Company
Review Text: Best coffee in town, you won't be disappointed. Small venues

Name: Coffee Company
Review Text: It's a coffee company. Very friendly staff though. Don't expect a lot of tables to sit and relaxed. Most are filled with laptop workers.

Name: Coffee Company
Review Text:
Very good coffee.
Expecially given that Coffee Company is a coffee shop network.

Name: Coffee Company
Review Text: Good coffee, nice place to stay, very comfortable

Name: Coffee Company
Review Text: Coffee is allright, laid-back place that is good to meet someone or work.

Name: Coffee Company
Review Text: Nice coffee, cozy place, friendly staff.

Name: Coffee Company
Review Text: Nice location. Drinks are ok. Toast tastes  good.

Name: Coffee Company
Review Text: Great coffee, NZ level, and a nice place to stop and relax.

Name: Coffee Company
Review Text: Excellent coffee and service

Name: Coffee Company
Review Text: A bit pricey for the matcha latte but seems like an ok place.

Name: Coffee Company
Review Text: Coffee is good, toilet was dirty and door wasn't closing

Name: Coffee Company
Review Text: Had a good coffee here, banana cake is yummy.

Name: Coffee Company
Review Text: Delicious coffees!

Name: Coffee Company
Review Text: Great hot coffee. Perfect for the weather in the Netherlands

Name: Coffee Company
Review Text: Pretty relaxt and good coffee. Can be a bit too crowded tho.

Name: Coffee Company
Review Text: Good coffee and chai. Big shared table

Name: Coffee Company
Review Text: Kind service, great coffee, sandwiches and atmosphere

Name: Coffee Company
Review Text: Great place to have a hot and nice coffee

Name: Coffee Company
Review Text: Typical cafe chain... Nothing special, bit too noisy

Name: Coffee Company
Review Text: Used to be better. But hey, super friendly staff and staying here is always nice.

Name: Coffee Company
Review Text: Coffee is good, although on the expensive side, but it is a good stop for a small break.

Name: Coffee Company
Review Text: Sweet place, very good coffee

Name: Coffee Company
Review Text: Friendly staff and decent soy latte!

Name: Coffee Company
Review Text: Good place to work on your online stuff, on a rainy day!

Name: Coffee Company
Review Text: Local coffee chain, great coffee and fresh snacks/pastries

Name: Coffee Company
Review Text: Typical cafe in the middle of Amsterdam. Good espresso

Name: Coffee Company
Review Text: Long wait due to short staff, typically only 2 ppl work at a time so line ups add into the service time

Name: Coffee Company
Review Text: Slooooow service no really slooooooow. Nice coffee

Name: Coffee Company
Review Text: Good coffee with accurate tasting notes

Review Text: Great vibe, coffee, and pastries!

Review Text: No matter who the chilled guy was which repaired the Internet, but you are a true Hero!!!
